title.rendered: The best WhatsApp congratulations for Mother’s Day |  Life

content.rendered:
Today is Mother’s Day! Show yours everything you feel for her with a WhatsApp congratulations. If you don’t know what to write to her, in this article you will find the best phrases, images, memes and apps to surprise her.

As happens on the first Sunday of May each year, today is Mother’s Day. Even if you are going to spend the day with your girlfriend or are going to call her on the phone, surely you also plan to send her a WhatsApp greeting.

In writing it is easier for us to express what we feel in a more poetic and beautiful way, so It never hurts to write a phrase to congratulate Mother’s Day. The problem is that, on many occasions, we are not able to find the right words, and we spend a good time looking at the blank screen of our mobile phone.

If this is precisely what has happened to you, do not panic because in this article you will find The best Mother’s Day greetings to send by WhatsApp and other instant messaging apps.

First of all, we have left you a selection of phrases for Mother’s Day, which you can copy directly or customize as you wish. We also indicate some apps to create your congratulations in a simple way from your mobile. Finally, you will find a gallery of images and another of memes to accompany your message.

The best WhatsApp congratulations for Mother’s Day

Phrases to congratulate Mother’s Day by WhatsApp

Let yourself be inspired and find the perfect phrase to congratulate Mother’s Day among the suggestions that we leave you below:

  • If mothers were flowers, you would be the most beautiful of roses. Happy day, mom!
  • Without a doubt, you will always be the woman of my life, the most important and the best of all. Happy Mother’s Day!
  • Mother there is only one, and like mine, none, I love you, mommy!
  • Unconditional love is not a myth: I have been able to experience it thanks to my mother. Happy day, mom!
  • Of all the gifts that life can give you, a good mother is the greatest of all.
  • Thank you, mom, for not telling me how to live, but for teaching me with your example.
  • Stop looking for a person who always loves you and doesn’t abandon you. You already have her: she is your mother.
  • A mother is someone who supports you when you cry, scolds you when you break the rules, takes pride when you succeed, and has faith in you even when you don’t. Thank you for being my support.

These tech products will give you more than one Mother’s Day gift idea you can buy. The best ideas for the most geeky mothers.

  • Life doesn’t come with an instruction manual, but I was lucky enough to have a fantastic role model. Thanks Mom.
  • Mom, although thousands and hundreds of kilometers separate us, I always have you by my side and I carry you in my thoughts.
  • If you were my mother, I would choose you as my best friend. I love you so much mom!
  • Every day I look a little more like you, mom, and that fills me with pride.
  • No gift I give you can equal the one you gave me: life. Happy Mother’s Day!
  • A mother is a woman who expects her children to be as good as she wanted to be. I hope I have succeeded. I love you mom.
  • Only you give me everything without asking for anything in return. I love you mom.
  • You have been my reference all my life and, although I have known you forever, I admire you more every day, mom. Happy Mother’s Day!
  • I could tell you with a rhyme, or better with a flower, but I’ll tell you in words: Mom, you’re the best!
  • My mom taught me that I shouldn’t go outside without dressing warmly, that I shouldn’t walk around the house barefoot and that when I have children, I’ll understand her. I love you!

  • Nothing is really lost until you, mom, can’t find it either. Happy Mother’s Day!
  • A mother is the person who makes tears disappear by magic. I love you mommy!
  • No matter how old you are: the arms of a mother are always the best refuge. Happy Mother’s Day!
  • Mom, your kisses heal everything. What would I do without you!
  • Whenever I need a hand, you give me three. Happy Mother’s Day!

Apps to create a greeting for Mother’s Day

If you would like to create a greeting for Mother’s Day more original and elaborate, you have the possibility of designing a card in a very fast and simple way.

There are many applications that allow you create a personalized greeting with your mobile in just a few minutes, for example Canva, and here we explain how to use it step by step. You don’t need to have advanced design knowledge and the result is really attractive.

Apart from this, you can also find specific applications to make congratulations for Mother’s Day. In general, these apps include a catalog of phrases and a gallery of images so that you can choose the elements that you like the most and assemble them using a template. Messages for Mother’s Day is one of the ones you can use if you have an Android phone, and Mom I love you if you have an iPhone.
